page.title: 16USE OF MEDIA IN BROMPTON
page.content: Television,radio & the press are amongst the most popular forms of media used by people in the Brompton area.Television provides entertainment almost throughout the day & gives a comprehensive news coverage both at national & local level.The stations received include BBC1 & 2,Channel 4 & either Tyne Tees or Yorkshire Television.The use of video recorders is now also very popular.Radio also provides a varied programme on BBC Radio 1,2,3 & 4.Locally there is also BBC Radio Cleveland & York & the commercially operated Radio Tees.Most people take at least one daily newspaper.Amongst the most popular are the Sun,Daily Star,Daily Express & the Northern Echo.Locally,the weekly Darlington & Stockton Times & the N. Yorkshire News are also widely read along with a wide choice of magazines.
